name: Wikipedia
description: Provides real-time access to Wikipedia information and enables LLMs to search, retrieve, summarize, and extract detailed content from Wikipedia articles across multiple languages.

operations.name: Search Wikipedia
operations.description: Search Wikipedia for articles matching a query.

operations.name: Get Article
operations.description: Get the full content of a Wikipedia article.

operations.name: Get Summary
operations.description: Get a summary of a Wikipedia article.

operations.name: Summarize Article For Query
operations.description: Get a summary of a Wikipedia article tailored to a specific query.

operations.name: Summarize Article Section
operations.description: Get a summary of a specific section of a Wikipedia article.

operations.name: Extract Key Facts
operations.description: Extract key facts from a Wikipedia article, optionally focused on a topic.

operations.name: Get Related Topics
operations.description: Get topics related to a Wikipedia article based on links and categories.

operations.name: Get Sections
operations.description: Get the sections of a Wikipedia article.

operations.name: Get Links
operations.description: Get the links contained within a Wikipedia article.
